actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to repeal the equal time requirement for candidates for the Office of President and Vice President.

summary.text: Repeals under the Communications Act of 1934, the equal time requirement for candidates for the office of Presidnet and Vice President of the United States in a general election. (Amends 47 U.S.C. 315(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to repeal the equal time requirement for candidates for the Office of President and Vice President.
